title: Lady Spring - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Celebrities   Childhood Love   C*nnilingus   Female Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests
author: Chocolat   쇼콜라
description:
Saeun is an ordinary girl with ordinary looks and a troublesome family. She used to have a secret crush on Wooyoung in high school.

Wooyoung  is a member of the popular Kpop group Strawberry Fields.

Being a good student used to be everything to Saeun. 10 years later, she lives a boring life when Wooyoung, who became a star, suddenly appears in front of her. >
